questions.question: Two polarisers A and B are kept one after the other. Their pass axis makes an angle of 45 with each other. An unpolarized light of intensity I₀ strikes A first and then B. Find the intensity of the light emergent from B.
questions.hint: Use Malus' Law: After first polarizer (A), intensity becomes I₀/2. After second polarizer (B) at 45°, multiply by cos²(45°) = 0.5

questions.question: Simple pendulum of length 'l = 4' is taken to height 'R' above earth surface calculate time period at its height {R → Radius of Earth & Taken π² = g}
questions.hint: Time period at height R: T = 2π√[l/(g')] where g' = g/(1 + h/R)². Here h = R ⇒ g' = g/4

questions.question: If for a given planet R_P = 1/3 R_E & M_P = 1/6 M_E then find the escape speed for this planet if the escape speed of earth is 11.2 km/s
questions.hint: Escape velocity formula: v_escape = √(2GM/R). Use ratio v_p/v_E = √[(M_p/M_E)(R_E/R_p)]

questions.question: A block of mass 1 kg is pulled up on an inclined plane 60° by a force of 10 N. Coefficient of friction is µ = 0.1. Find the magnitude of Work done by the friction by the time block moves up by 10 m.
questions.hint: Work done by friction = μmgcosθ × distance. Calculate normal force (mgcosθ) first

questions.question: Find the Tension T₁ & T₂ in the given system
questions.hint: Analyze forces using pulley systems and equilibrium conditions. Consider tension distribution in multiple pulley arrangements
questions.image_description: Pulley system with multiple ropes and masses where tensions need to be calculated using force balance equations

questions.question: Find value of P in the dimensional equation M¹ = [Cᴾ G⁻½ h¹/²] where C → speed of light, G → Universal gravitational constant, h → Planck's constant
questions.hint: Perform dimensional analysis: Express each constant in terms of [M], [L], [T] dimensions and equate powers

questions.question: Charge -q rotating around infinite long wire having charge density λ at distance r then calculate the time period of that -q Charge.
questions.hint: Equate centripetal force to electric force: mv²/r = (2kλq)/r. Relate velocity to angular velocity (v = 2πr/T)

questions.question: 2 moles of monatomic gas (γ = 3/2) is mixed with 3 moles of diatomic gas (γ = 5/7). Find γ of the mixture where γ = C_p/C_v.
questions.hint: Calculate C_v and C_p for each gas. Use formula: γ_mix = (n₁C_p₁ + n₂C_p₂)/(n₁C_v₁ + n₂C_v₂)
